data.description: Come and see the value this contemporary ranch home offers! Large 2,552 sq. ft open floor plan home on a great lot! Inside, you'll find five spacious bedrooms with two full & one 3/4 baths that will make any daily routine a pleasure. The primary bedroom is a true retreat, featuring a generous walk-in closet. Main floor bedrooms make life easy. Use all or one for an office or crafts and projects. The eat-in kitchen is perfect for culinary enthusiasts. Don't miss the finished basement,  2-car garage, washer/dryer, patio and fenced yard. Don't miss out on this great opportunity at a great price!
